snippet: The victory came a day after Novak Djokovic lost his top ranking to Rafael Nadal, who needed only to reach the tournament’s final to take over the No. 1 spot.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Rafael Nadal to win China Open, and Serena Williams beats Jelena Jankovic to win women's title.
lead_paragraph: The victory came a day after Novak Djokovic lost his top ranking to Rafael Nadal, who needed only to reach the tournament’s final to take over the No. 1 spot.

headline.main: Djokovic and Williams Win China Open
